1234 float moduloRatio = fabsf(modulo) / snap;
1235 if (moduloRatio < snapTension)
1236 {
1237 *value -= modulo;
1238 }
1239 else if (moduloRatio > (1.f - snapTension))
1240 {
1241 *value = *value - modulo + snap * ((*value < 0.f) ? -1.f : 1.f);
1242 }
1243 }

参照先 ComputeSnap(), snapTension.

1290 cameraToModelNormalized = Normalized(gContext.mModel.v.position - gContext.mCameraEye);
1291 }
1292
1293 cameraToModelNormalized.TransformVector(gContext.mModelInverse);
1294
1295 gContext.mRadiusSquareCenter = screenRotateSize * gContext.mHeight;
1296
1297 bool hasRSC = Intersects(op, ROTATE_SCREEN);
1298 for (int axis = 0; axis < 3; axis++)
1299 {
1300 if(!Intersects(op, static_cast<OPERATION>(ROTATE_Z >> axis)))
1301 {
1302 continue;
1303 }
1304
1305 bool isAxisMasked = ((1 << (2 - axis)) & gContext.mAxisMask) != 0;
1306
1307 if ((!isAxisMasked || isMultipleAxesMasked) && !isNoAxesMasked)
1308 {
1309 continue;
1310 }
1311 const bool usingAxis = (gContext.mbUsing && type == MT_ROTATE_Z - axis);
1312 const int circleMul = (hasRSC && !usingAxis) ? 1 : 2;
1313
1314 ImVec2* circlePos = (ImVec2*)alloca(sizeof(ImVec2) * (circleMul * halfCircleSegmentCount + 1));
1315
1316 float angleStart = atan2f(cameraToModelNormalized[(4 - axis) % 3], cameraToModelNormalized[(3 - axis) % 3]) + ZPI * 0.5f;
1317
1318 for (int i = 0; i < circleMul * halfCircleSegmentCount + 1; i++)
1319 {
1320 float ng = angleStart + (float)circleMul * ZPI * ((float)i / (float)(circleMul * halfCircleSegmentCount));
1321 vec_t axisPos = makeVect(cosf(ng), sinf(ng), 0.f);
1322 vec_t pos = makeVect(axisPos[axis], axisPos[(axis + 1) % 3], axisPos[(axis + 2) % 3]) * gContext.mScreenFactor * rotationDisplayFactor;
1323 circlePos[i] = worldToPos(pos, gContext.mMVP);
1324 }
1325 if (!gContext.mbUsing || usingAxis)
1326 {
1327 drawList->AddPolyline(circlePos, circleMul* halfCircleSegmentCount + 1, colors[3 - axis], false, gContext.mStyle.RotationLineThickness);
1328 }
1329
1330 float radiusAxis = sqrtf((ImLengthSqr(worldToPos(gContext.mModel.v.position, gContext.mViewProjection) - circlePos[0])));
1331 if (radiusAxis > gContext.mRadiusSquareCenter)
1332 {
1333 gContext.mRadiusSquareCenter = radiusAxis;
1334 }
1335 }
1336 if(hasRSC && (!gContext.mbUsing || type == MT_ROTATE_SCREEN) && (!isMultipleAxesMasked && isNoAxesMasked))
1337 {
1338 drawList->AddCircle(worldToPos(gContext.mModel.v.position, gContext.mViewProjection), gContext.mRadiusSquareCenter, colors[0], 64, gContext.mStyle.RotationOuterLineThickness);
1339 }
1340
1341 if (gContext.mbUsing && (gContext.GetCurrentID() == gContext.mEditingID) && IsRotateType(type))
1342 {
1343 ImVec2 circlePos[halfCircleSegmentCount + 1];
1344
1345 circlePos[0] = worldToPos(gContext.mModel.v.position, gContext.mViewProjection);
1346 for (unsigned int i = 1; i < halfCircleSegmentCount + 1; i++)
1347 {
1348 float ng = gContext.mRotationAngle * ((float)(i - 1) / (float)(halfCircleSegmentCount - 1));
1349 matrix_t rotateVectorMatrix;
1350 rotateVectorMatrix.RotationAxis(gContext.mTranslationPlan, ng);
1351 vec_t pos;
1352 pos.TransformPoint(gContext.mRotationVectorSource, rotateVectorMatrix);
1353 pos *= gContext.mScreenFactor * rotationDisplayFactor;
1354 circlePos[i] = worldToPos(pos + gContext.mModel.v.position, gContext.mViewProjection);
1355 }
1356 drawList->AddConvexPolyFilled(circlePos, halfCircleSegmentCount + 1, GetColorU32(ROTATION_USING_FILL));
1357 drawList->AddPolyline(circlePos, halfCircleSegmentCount + 1, GetColorU32(ROTATION_USING_BORDER), true, gContext.mStyle.RotationLineThickness);
1358
1359 ImVec2 destinationPosOnScreen = circlePos[1];
1360 char tmps[512];
1361 ImFormatString(tmps, sizeof(tmps), rotationInfoMask[type - MT_ROTATE_X], (gContext.mRotationAngle / ZPI) * 180.f, gContext.mRotationAngle);
1362 drawList->AddText(ImVec2(destinationPosOnScreen.x + 15, destinationPosOnScreen.y + 15), GetColorU32(TEXT_SHADOW), tmps);
1363 drawList->AddText(ImVec2(destinationPosOnScreen.x + 14, destinationPosOnScreen.y + 14), GetColorU32(TEXT), tmps);
1364 }
1365 }

1943 if(!Intersects(op, static_cast<OPERATION>(SCALE_X << i)))
1944 {
1945 continue;
1946 }
1947 bool isAxisMasked = ((1 << i) & gContext.mAxisMask) != 0;
1948
1949 vec_t dirPlaneX, dirPlaneY, dirAxis;
1950 bool belowAxisLimit, belowPlaneLimit;
1951 ComputeTripodAxisAndVisibility(i, dirAxis, dirPlaneX, dirPlaneY, belowAxisLimit, belowPlaneLimit, true);
1952 dirAxis.TransformVector(gContext.mModelLocal);
1953 dirPlaneX.TransformVector(gContext.mModelLocal);
1954 dirPlaneY.TransformVector(gContext.mModelLocal);
1955
1956 const float len = IntersectRayPlane(gContext.mRayOrigin, gContext.mRayVector, BuildPlan(gContext.mModelLocal.v.position, dirAxis));
1957 vec_t posOnPlan = gContext.mRayOrigin + gContext.mRayVector * len;
1958
1959 const float startOffset = Contains(op, static_cast<OPERATION>(TRANSLATE_X << i)) ? 1.0f : 0.1f;
1960 const float endOffset = Contains(op, static_cast<OPERATION>(TRANSLATE_X << i)) ? 1.4f : 1.0f;
1961 const ImVec2 posOnPlanScreen = worldToPos(posOnPlan, gContext.mViewProjection);
1962 const ImVec2 axisStartOnScreen = worldToPos(gContext.mModelLocal.v.position + dirAxis * gContext.mScreenFactor * startOffset, gContext.mViewProjection);
1963 const ImVec2 axisEndOnScreen = worldToPos(gContext.mModelLocal.v.position + dirAxis * gContext.mScreenFactor * endOffset, gContext.mViewProjection);
1964
1965 vec_t closestPointOnAxis = PointOnSegment(makeVect(posOnPlanScreen), makeVect(axisStartOnScreen), makeVect(axisEndOnScreen));
1966
1967 if ((closestPointOnAxis - makeVect(posOnPlanScreen)).Length() < 12.f) // pixel size
1968 {
1969 if (!isAxisMasked)
1970 type = MT_SCALE_X + i;
1971 }
1972 }
1973
1974 // universal
1975
1976 vec_t deltaScreen = { io.MousePos.x - gContext.mScreenSquareCenter.x, io.MousePos.y - gContext.mScreenSquareCenter.y, 0.f, 0.f };
1977 float dist = deltaScreen.Length();
1978 if (Contains(op, SCALEU) && dist >= 17.0f && dist < 23.0f)
1979 {
1980 type = MT_SCALE_XYZ;
1981 }
1982
1983 for (int i = 0; i < 3 && type == MT_NONE; i++)
1984 {
1985 if (!Intersects(op, static_cast<OPERATION>(SCALE_XU << i)))
1986 {
1987 continue;
1988 }
1989
1990 vec_t dirPlaneX, dirPlaneY, dirAxis;
1991 bool belowAxisLimit, belowPlaneLimit;
1992 ComputeTripodAxisAndVisibility(i, dirAxis, dirPlaneX, dirPlaneY, belowAxisLimit, belowPlaneLimit, true);
1993
1994 // draw axis
1995 if (belowAxisLimit)
1996 {
1997 bool hasTranslateOnAxis = Contains(op, static_cast<OPERATION>(TRANSLATE_X << i));
1998 float markerScale = hasTranslateOnAxis ? 1.4f : 1.0f;
1999 //ImVec2 baseSSpace = worldToPos(dirAxis * 0.1f * gContext.mScreenFactor, gContext.mMVPLocal);
2000 //ImVec2 worldDirSSpaceNoScale = worldToPos(dirAxis * markerScale * gContext.mScreenFactor, gContext.mMVP);
2001 ImVec2 worldDirSSpace = worldToPos((dirAxis * markerScale) * gContext.mScreenFactor, gContext.mMVPLocal);
2002
2003 float distance = sqrtf(ImLengthSqr(worldDirSSpace - io.MousePos));
2004 if (distance < 12.f)
2005 {
2006 type = MT_SCALE_X + i;
2007 }
2008 }
2009 }
2010 return type;
2011 }

849 {

868 else
869 clipSpaceAxis.y /= gContext.mDisplayRatio;

2439 gContext.mRotationAngleOrigin = ComputeAngleOnPlan();
2440 }
2441 }

2443 // rotation

2447 ImGui::SetNextFrameWantCaptureMouse(true);
2448#else
2449 ImGui::CaptureMouseFromApp();
2450#endif

2453 {
2454 float snapInRadian = snap[0] * DEG2RAD;
2455 ComputeSnap(&gContext.mRotationAngle, snapInRadian);
2456 }
2457 vec_t rotationAxisLocalSpace;
2458
2459 rotationAxisLocalSpace.TransformVector(makeVect(gContext.mTranslationPlan.x, gContext.mTranslationPlan.y, gContext.mTranslationPlan.z, 0.f), gContext.mModelInverse);
2460 rotationAxisLocalSpace.Normalize();
2461

2463 deltaRotation.RotationAxis(rotationAxisLocalSpace, gContext.mRotationAngle - gContext.mRotationAngleOrigin);
2464 if (gContext.mRotationAngle != gContext.mRotationAngleOrigin)
2465 {
2466 modified = true;
2467 }
2468 gContext.mRotationAngleOrigin = gContext.mRotationAngle;
2469
2470 matrix_t scaleOrigin;
2471 scaleOrigin.Scale(gContext.mModelScaleOrigin);
2472
2473 if (applyRotationLocaly)
2474 {
2475 *(matrix_t*)matrix = scaleOrigin * deltaRotation * gContext.mModelLocal;
2476 }
2477 else
2478 {
2479 matrix_t res = gContext.mModelSource;
2480 res.v.position.Set(0.f);
2481
2482 *(matrix_t*)matrix = res * deltaRotation;
2483 ((matrix_t*)matrix)->v.position = gContext.mModelSource.v.position;
2484 }
2485
2486 if (deltaMatrix)
2487 {
2488 *(matrix_t*)deltaMatrix = gContext.mModelInverse * deltaRotation * gContext.mModel;
2489 }
2490
2491 if (!io.MouseDown[0])
2492 {
2493 gContext.mbUsing = false;
2494 gContext.mEditingID = -1;
2495 }
2496 type = gContext.mCurrentOperation;
2497 }
2498 return modified;
2499 }
